itemDisplayName: Red Hat EAP server on top of Openshif Container Platform 3.9
description: This template allows you to create an Red Hat VM running Openshif Container platform and a cloud native image of  JBoss EAP 7 and and also deploy a web application called dukes, you can login into the admin console using the user and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: Deploy a web application to test Red Hat VM running JBoss EAP7 in standalone mode on top of Openshift
